## Checklist
<!-- Please check all that apply by replacing [ ] with [x] -->

- [ ] I have read the contribution guidelines in the README
- [ ] I have tested this workflow in Caido
- [ ] I have included all required files:
  - [ ] `definition.json` (renamed from Caido export)
  - [ ] `manifest.json` with correct metadata
  - [ ] `README.md` with documentation
- [ ] My manifest.json includes all required fields (author, description, version, etc.)
- [ ] My README.md includes author information and usage instructions
- [ ] The directory name matches the workflow ID in manifest.json
